00007 template <class SRC, class FEATURE>
00008 typename FEATURE::STATE XVTracker<SRC, FEATURE>::nextState() throw (XVTrackerException) {
00009   
00010   source.next_frame_continuous();
00011 
00012   typename FEATURE::STATE st;
00013   for(int i = 0; i < stepsPerFrame; ++i){
00014     st = feature.step((typename FEATURE::IMAGE)(source.current_frame()));
00015   }
00016   
00017   return st;
00018 };
00019 
00020 template <class SRC, class FEATURE>
00021 void XVTracker<SRC, FEATURE>::track() throw(XVTrackerException) {
00022     
00023   while(1){
00024     
00025     source.next_frame_continuous();
00026 
00027     for(int i = 0; i < stepsPerFrame; ++i){
00028       feature.step((typename FEATURE::IMAGE)(source.current_frame()));
00029     }
00030   }
00031 };

00033 template <class SRC, class WIN, class FEATURE>
00034 typename FEATURE::STATE XVDisplayTracker<SRC, WIN, FEATURE>::init(){
00035 
00036   source.next_frame_continuous();
00037   window.CopySubImage(source.current_frame());
00038   window.swap_buffers();
00039   window.flush();
00040 
00041   typename FEATURE::STATE s = feature.interactiveInit(window, 
00042               (typename FEATURE::IMAGE)(source.current_frame()));
00043   window.setCOPY();
00044   return s;
00045 };
00046 
00047 template <class SRC, class WIN, class FEATURE>
00048 void XVDisplayTracker<SRC, WIN, FEATURE>::track() throw(XVTrackerException) {
00049 
00050   while(1){
00051     
00052     source.next_frame_continuous();
00053 
00054     for(int i = 0; i < stepsPerFrame; ++i){
00055       feature.step((typename FEATURE::IMAGE)(source.current_frame()));
00056     }
00057 
00058     window.CopySubImage(source.current_frame());
00059     
00060     feature.show(window);
00061     
00062     window.swap_buffers();
00063     window.flush();
00064   }
00065 };
00066 
00067 template <class SRC, class WIN, class FEATURE>
00068 typename FEATURE::STATE XVDisplayTracker<SRC, WIN, FEATURE>::nextState() throw (XVTrackerException) {
00069   
00070   source.next_frame_continuous();
00071   
00072   typename FEATURE::STATE st;
00073   for(int i = 0; i < stepsPerFrame; ++i){
00074     st = feature.step((typename FEATURE::IMAGE)(source.current_frame()));
00075   }
00076 
00077   window.CopySubImage(source.current_frame());
00078   
00079   feature.show(window);
00080 
00081   window.swap_buffers();
00082   window.flush();
00083   
00084   return st;
00085 };
